interface.name: MultivariateDifferentiableVectorFunction
interface.javadoc:
Extension of {@link MultivariateVectorFunction} representing a multivariate differentiable vectorial function.
$Id: MultivariateDifferentiableVectorFunction.java 1462496 2013-03-29 14:56:08Z psteitz $
3.1

Compute the value for the function at the given point.
point point at which the function must be evaluated
function value for the given point
MathIllegalArgumentException if {@code point} does not satisfy the function's constraints (wrong dimension, argument out of bound, or unsupported derivative order for example)
